attributes.action: Give Capt Tom Moore a Knighthood for his services to britain
attributes.additional_details: Because he has shown an exceptional commitment to this country and is a 99 year old war veteran, his service NEEDS to be recognised
attributes.background: We would like our UK Government to give Capt Tom Moore a knighthood for outstanding service to our country during the Covid-19 pandemic raising millions of pounds for the NHS Frontline

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
